mapper.select: SELECT game_id, game_name, genre_name, genre_id, os_name, discount_rate, price, image1, status FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum rn FROM ( ( SELECT g.game_id, g.game_name, e.genre_name, s.genre_id, o.os_name, g.discount_rate, g.price, i.image1, g.status FROM t_game g, t_game_images i, t_os o, t_genre e, t_game_genres s WHERE e.genre_id = s.genre_id AND g.game_id = s.game_id AND g.os_id = o.os_id AND g.game_id = i.game_id AND g.status = 0 AND UPPER(g.game_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{search}) || '%' ORDER BY g.game_id DESC ) a ) ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.delete: DELETE t_favorite_game WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND game_id = #{game_id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) AS num FROM t_favorite_game WHERE game_id = #{game_id} AND user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT status FROM t_game WHERE game_id = #{GAMEID}
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE t_bbs_${gameId} ( seq NUMBER(6) NOT NULL, group_id NUMBER(6), parent_id NUMBER(6), view_order NUMBER(6), user_id VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, header_id NUMBER(2) NOT NULL, post_title VARCHAR2(50), post_pw NUMBER(4), reg_date VARCHAR2(8), post_content VARCHAR2(100), image1 VARCHAR2(50), image2 VARCHAR2(50), image3 VARCHAR2(50), image4 VARCHAR2(50), image5 VARCHAR2(50), view_count NUMBER(8), CONSTRAINT pk_t_bbs_${gameId} PRIMARY KEY(seq), CONSTRAINT fk_t_bbs_${gameId}_user FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES t_user(user_id), CONSTRAINT fk_t_bbs_${gameId}_header FOREIGN KEY(header_id) REFERENCES t_header(header_id) )

CREATE TABLE t_reply_${gameId} ( seq NUMBER(6) NOT NULL, re_seq NUMBER(3), re_group NUMBER(3), re_parent NUMBER(3), re_view NUMBER(3), user_id VARCHAR2(50), re_reg VARCHAR2(8), re_comment VARCHAR2(1000), re_depth NUMBER(2), CONSTRAINT uk_t_reply_${gameId}_re_seq PRIMARY KEY(re_seq), CONSTRAINT fk_t_reply_${gameId}_seq FOREIGN KEY(seq) REFERENCES t_bbs_${gameId}(seq), CONSTRAINT fk_t_reply_${gameId}_user_id FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES t_user(user_id) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_game_images ( game_id, image1, image2, image3, image4, image5 ) VALUES ( #{game_id}, #{image1}, #{image2}, #{image3}, #{image4}, #{image5} )
